column2: UPDATE 2-U.S. Supreme Court to weigh Miami predatory lending lawsuitU.S. Supreme Court to weigh Miami predatory lending lawsuit WASHINGTON The U.S. Supreme Court on Tuesday agreed to decide whether Miami can pursue lawsuits accusing major banks of predatory mortgage lending to black and Hispanic home buyers resulting in loan defaults that drove down city tax revenues and property values.
